channel.title: Optimizer on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Optimizer on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: What would actually make the Apple Watch better?
item.description: I’ve been thinking ahead to Apple’s big event next Tuesday. I’ll be sitting in Apple’s Steve Jobs theater, ready to live blog. Tim Cook will pop out for a brief moment to wave hello. I’ll probably nod

item.title: Welcome to Optimizer, our relentless quest to live a smarter, healthier life
item.description: Every year, I sit in these fancy amphitheaters and watch the biggest names in tech promise how their latest phone, smartwatch, app, chatbot, or doohickey will make our lives better. This calendar app?
